boofcv.processing

Class SimpleImage<T extends ImageBase>

  • java.lang.Object
    • boofcv.processing.SimpleImage<T>
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    SimpleColor, SimpleGray, SimpleLabeledImage

    public class SimpleImage<T extends ImageBase>
extends Object
    Base class for simplified images. This provides a more object oriented way of interacting with images.
